import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Web3 from 'web3' import Token from '../abis/Token.json' class App extends Component { componentWillMount() { this.loadBlockchainData() } async loadBlockchainData(){ const web3 = new Web3(Web3.givenProvider || 'http://localhost:7545') const network = await web3.eth.net.getNetworkType() const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts() //console.log('network', network) //console.log('accounts', accounts) console.log("Token", Token) } render() { return (
